Class Alignment

    AligmentTest

    @Component
public class Alignment
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Cesar Amadori

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alignment() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areAligned(Coordinates p1, Coordinates p2, Coordinates p3)
      Given coordinates from the 3 planets will verify
      if the planets are aligned based on the slope created by two planets and
      the third planet as a dot inside the straight line
      boolean areAlignedWithSun(Coordinates p1, Coordinates p2, Coordinates p3)
      Given coordinates from the 3 planets will verify
      if the planets are aligned with the sun based on the equality of two slopes
      the first created between two planets and the second created with the third planet and the sun
      double getSlope(Coordinates p1, Coordinates p2)
      Given coordinates from the 2 planets will calculate the slope of the straight line.

      • Alignment

        public Alignment()

    • Method Detail

      • areAligned

        public boolean areAligned(Coordinates p1,
                          Coordinates p2,
                          Coordinates p3)

        Given coordinates from the 3 planets will verify
        if the planets are aligned based on the slope created by two planets and
        the third planet as a dot inside the straight line

        Parameters:
        p1 - Planet1
        p2 - Planet2
        p3 - Planet3

        Note: About tolerance of the approximation to the perfect alignment.
        As we don't have the size of any of the planets,
        i gave more tolerance to include the planet mass.

        Returns:
        If the three planets are aligned.

      • areAlignedWithSun

        public boolean areAlignedWithSun(Coordinates p1,
                                 Coordinates p2,
                                 Coordinates p3)

        Given coordinates from the 3 planets will verify
        if the planets are aligned with the sun based on the equality of two slopes
        the first created between two planets and the second created with the third planet and the sun

        Parameters:
        p1 - Planet1
        p2 - Planet2
        p3 - Planet3

        Note: About tolerance of the approximation to the perfect alignment.
        As we don't have the size of any of the planets,
        i gave more tolerance to include the planet mass.

        Returns:
        If the three planets are aligned with the sun.

      • getSlope

        public double getSlope(Coordinates p1,
                       Coordinates p2)

        Given coordinates from the 2 planets will calculate the slope of the straight line.

        Parameters:
        p1 - Planet1
        p2 - Planet2
        Returns:
        The value of the slope.
